name: @solana/wallet-adapter-mobile
description: An adapter for mobile Solana wallets
author: Steven Luscher <steven.luscher@solana.com>

scripts.build: yarn clean && tsc -p tsconfig.json && tsc-esm -p tsconfig.json && tsc -p tsconfig.cjs.json
scripts.build:watch: yarn clean && tsc --watch -p tsconfig.json && tsc-esm --watch -p tsconfig.json && tsc --watch -p tsconfig.cjs.json
scripts.postbuild: echo '{"type":"commonjs"}' | npx json > lib/cjs/package.json && echo '{"type":"module"} ' | npx json > lib/esm/package.json
